A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I genuinely liked this movie. I feel like the people who don't like it are the hard line star wars fanatics who would be irritated by a film taking a different narrative path from the previous second films in the saga and the Tumblr shippers angry that StormPilot wasn't a thing. However\, as someone who just enjoys the movies and the characters\, I thought this film showed some very interesting character growth and plot twists that I didn't expect. It wasn't an all around incredible film as I thought it was about half an hour too long\, but I give it a very solid 7/10. I think most of the negative reviews on this site now are from bots that some haters have made as they all say similar\, unenlightened things.
